## LinearRegressorHyperparams interface

The set of hyperparameters for a [LinearRegressor](./vector.linearregressor.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LinearRegressorHyperparams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [lambda](./vector.linearregressorhyperparams.lambda.md) | <code>number</code> | A number whose value influences the penalty for large coefficients. Large values of <code>lambda</code> correspond to highly regularized models, and correct for overfitting. Small values of <code>lambda</code> correspond to highly biased models, and correct for underfitting. |
